attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not think that Young people should have to stay on at college until they're 18 by law. I think this is a bad idea because it just cloggs up Colleges with people who don't want to be there and it would cripple our already underfunded, undermined and terrible Education system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
